skills.name: Gatling Gun
skills.description: Rapid-fire weapon that deals continuous DMG to targets along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies take more DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less). Charged ATK Crits deal 50% ATK of Physical DMG in a small area. CD: 0.3s.

skills.name: Inferno Breath
skills.description: [SP: 5][CD: 15s] Wielder gains 10% Crit Rate and 25% Crit DMG for 10s. Attacks no longer cause overheating. However, wielder loses HP equal to 2% max HP per second.
